ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: slam is an inate ability of you big folk, Barbarians, Trolls, Ogres.  Bash you need a sheild for and is a trainable skill for warrior types. Salr D Taynkk Dark
ygData.messageBody:
slam is an inate ability of you big folk, Barbarians, Trolls, Ogres. Bash you need a sheild for and is a trainable skill for warrior types.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...> 5.18.99 8:10:49 AM >>>
From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>

What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing everyone
like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I find
out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so slamming
people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
